page.title: 16Shipton C/E Primary School
page.content: A new school is being built in Station Lane,south west of the present school.Two more schools,Newton on Ouse and Tollerton will be closing down as well.The children will come to the new school. {Redhouse School Redhouse is a private boarding school it is situated off the A59 and is surrounded with 70 acres of gardens, orchards,playing fields and meadows. Unlike the children at Shipton they wear a grey uniform.There are about 12 children in a class and there are 7 forms.They start school at 8.30am, start lunch at 12.45pm.On Saturday they work until 12.45pm.The headmaster is Major Gordon.There are many activities for the children including horse riding,sailing, carpentry,skiing and camping.
